projects.name: Comparison of abdominal incisions
projects.body: The goal of this project is to re-evaluate different abdominal incisions in use, to analyse any single step in every incision and to compare the clinical outcome, early and late complications etc.

projects.name: Simulation
projects.body: The NESA designs and promotes the next generation of simulators, so-called biosimulators, which will enable surgeons to become familiar with the new challenges brought about by Natural Orifice Surgery. Surgeons will be trained and certified prior to performing operations.
